txt.en: Wanted: Broken longswords from the evil Men and Trolls surrounding Thorenhad. The items are to be delivered to a collection box. There is a collection box at Thorenhad in the Trollshaws.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
You have not recovered enough broken longswords for the Elves at Thorenhad.
Elves of Rivendell Task: Broken Longswords
The Elves at Thorenhad desire a delivery of broken longswords to be delivered to them.
Deliver the broken longswords to the collection box

You have accepted a task to collect broken longswords from the evil men and trolls in the areas surrounding Thorenhad. The items are to be delivered to a collection box. There is a collection box at Thorenhad in the Trollshaws.
Wanted: Broken longswords from the evil Men and Trolls surrounding Thorenhad.
